name: pOp (itch)
description:
pOp is a party game designed for up to 4 players. It barely looks like football, with no gravity (just like in space).

Touch the ball to make it yours, then kick it and goal !

This game is compatible with Xbox 360 controllers.

(An Android/iOS port will probably be released if the game is appreciated enough. Support it on Ludum Dare )

Music by http://playonloop.com/
